Class MandelbrotRenderer

java.lang.Object
MandelbrotRenderer
public class MandelbrotRenderer extends Object
Renderer class responsible for generating the Mandelbrot set image.

      public void render(double xOffset, double yOffset, double zoom)

      yOffset - The y-axis offset
